www.3-hajime.com has a link called
http://www.the-shinsengumi.com
what makes this site soo different is that there are mini video
downloads. For example there is a clip of a Shinsengumi re-enactment
which to me looks like the one which occurred during a parade at Aizu.
There is a young female host (at one point attempts and Okita
impersonation) takes you on a tour of a museum (or location connected
to the Shinsengumi). Then in another clip she interview someone. All
files are for windows media player and my computer would only play the
first few seconds before "dying" so I haven't see the entire files.

How do you find the link when babelfish cannot/will not translate this
page? Go to the sword and click on the link right in the middle of the
blade that should take you to the list of vids.

Tiffany
secretarytocapt3
http://www.shinsengumimb.com

P.S. still reeling from the translation...the people from Chiba
totally lead me on about policemen, S.H. doine somethin bad but not
criminal...geez...it was right after the fall of Aizu and he was a POW
so to speak
